hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT C.NAME,S.SUBMITTED_ON,P.NAME,SC.TOTAL_SCORE FROM CANDIDATE C,SOLUTIONS S,SCORES SC,PROBLEMS P WHERE C.CANDIDATE_ID=SC.CANDIDATE_ID AND C.CANDIDATE_ID=S.CANDIDATE_ID AND P.PROBLEM_ID=S.PROBLEM_ID AND P.PROBLEM_ID=:problemId

SELECT C.NAME,S.SUBMITTED_ON,P.NAME,SC.TOTAL_SCORE FROM CANDIDATE C,SOLUTIONS S,SCORES SC,PROBLEMS P WHERE C.CANDIDATE_ID=SC.CANDIDATE_ID AND C.CANDIDATE_ID=S.CANDIDATE_ID AND P.PROBLEM_ID=S.PROBLEM_ID

SELECT distinct A.PROBLEM_ID, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE ,P.NAME FROM ASSESSMENT_SCHEDULE A, CANDIDATE C, USERS U, GROUPS G ,PROBLEMS P WHERE C.USER_ID=:userId AND C.GROUP_ID=G.GROUP_ID AND G.GROUP_ID=A.GROUP_ID AND A.PROBLEM_ID=P.PROBLEM_ID AND A.ENABLE=TRUE
